targets.expr: sum by(container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="",namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="POD"}[2m] ) )/ sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod",container="$container"}) by (container)

sum by(container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="",namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="POD"}[2m] ) )/ sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu",namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}) by (container)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!=""}) by (container) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_memory_bytes{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}) by (container)
